name: .dqc.constructcheck
return: boolean and if the construct exists

name: .dqc.tableticking
descrip: Checks if a table has obtained records within a specified time period
return: boolean and how many records where in the time specified

name: .dqc.chkslowsub
descrip: Checks queues on handles to make sure there is no slow subscribers
return: boolean and list of any slow subscribers

name: .dqc.tablecount
descrip: Checks a table count against a number. This can be a check of > = or <
return: boolean and the count of the table

name: .dqc.tablehasrecords
descrip: A projection of .dqe.tablecount that is used to check if a table has records
return: boolean and the count of the table

name: .dqc.attrcheck
descrip: Checks if a table's schema matches expectation

name: .dqc.anomalychk
descrip: Checks percentage of anomalies in list of columns of table
return: table with percentage of anomalies per column and if it is below threshold

name: .dqc.freeform
descrip: Checks if query has passsed correctly

name: .dqc.schemacheck
descrip: Checks if meta of table matches expectation

name: .dqc.datechk
descrip: Checks that date vector contains latest date in an hdb
return: 1b if dates match else returns 0b if dates do not match or if directory is not partitioned or if date is not a partition field

name: .dqc.nullchk
descrip: Checks percentage of nulls in list of columns of table
return: table with percentage of nulls per column and if it is below threshold

name: .dqc.symfilecheck
return: boolean and if sym file exists

name: .dqc.xmarketalert
descrip: Checks if bid price has exceeded the ask in market data
return: boolean and whether the price has exceeded

name: .dqc.dfilechk
descrip: Checks the .d file in latest date matches previous date values
return: 1b if files match or if there is only one partition else returns 0b if files do not match or if directory is not partitioned or if there are no two files for the table

name: .dqc.rangechk
descrip: Checks whether values of columns from prespecified list are within the range
return: table with percentage of values within range per column and if it is below threshold

name: .dqc.tablecountcomp
descrip: Counts the number of rows in a table. Used for table count comparisons
return: number of rows in the table

name: .dqc.pctAvgDailyChange
descrip: Checks if a funciton applied to table is within the threshold limits of an n day average
return: list containing a boolean (whether the check passed) and a string (detailing how it passed or failed)
